hero.title: Digitize Your Property Inspection Processes Completely
hero.subtitle: Replace traditional paper-based processes with modern digital solutions with BondShield
hero.description: A comprehensive inspection and bond management platform for property owners, tenants, real estate agents, and inspectors.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Optimize your property inspection processes with BondShield's comprehensive feature set

photo_video.title: Photo & Video Recording
photo_video.description: Take high-quality photos and videos during inspections. Automatic metadata addition and secure storage.

pdf_reports.title: PDF Report Generation
pdf_reports.description: Professional inspection reports are automatically generated. Protected with digital signature and security features.

security.title: Secure Authentication
security.description: Maximum security with biometric login, Face ID/Touch ID support, and AES-256 encryption.

location.title: Location-Based Inspection
location.description: Verify property locations with GPS coordinates. Distance calculation and map integration.

offline.title: Offline Operation
offline.description: Perform inspections without internet connection. Data is automatically synchronized.

multi_user.title: Multi-User Support
multi_user.description: User management with separate roles for property owners, tenants, and inspectors.

platform.title: Comprehensive Property Inspection Platform
platform.subtitle: BondShield offers integrated solutions for all stakeholders in the real estate sector

property_owners.title: Property Owners
property_owners.description: Manage your properties securely, track inspection processes, and communicate transparently with your tenants.

tenants.title: Tenants
tenants.description: Record the condition of your rented property, store it securely, and share it when needed.

agents.title: Real Estate Agents
agents.description: Offer professional inspection services to your clients, speed up processes, and gain credibility.

inspectors.title: Inspectors
inspectors.description: Systematize your inspection processes, automatically generate reports, and increase your work efficiency.

how_it_works.title: How Does It Work?
how_it_works.subtitle: Complete your inspection process in 4 simple steps with BondShield

step1.title: Start Inspection
step1.description: Select your property and determine the inspection type. Create room list and start the inspection process.

step2.title: Take Photos & Notes
step2.description: Take detailed photos for each room, take notes, and record conditions. Work anywhere with offline support.

step3.title: Generate Report
step3.description: When the inspection is completed, a professional PDF report is automatically generated. Secured with digital signature.

step4.title: Share & Manage
step4.description: Share reports securely, archive them, and use them as reference for future inspections.

ai.title: AI-Powered Inspection
ai.subtitle: Enhance your property inspection processes with artificial intelligence technology with BondShield AI
ai.description: BondShield AI optimizes your property inspection processes with artificial intelligence technology. Make more efficient and accurate inspections with intelligent visual analysis, automatic report generation, and predictive analysis features.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that suits your needs. All plans include 14 days free trial.

cta.title: Digitize Your Property Inspection Processes Today
cta.description: Replace traditional paper-based processes with modern digital solutions with BondShield. Start now for secure, transparent, and efficient inspection processes.

footer.description: Digitize your property inspection processes. Secure, transparent, and efficient solutions.
